title: Web-based HTML Coding Expert Training Program Utilizing Visual Models

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service or in-service teachers to strengthen HTML coding instructional competencies, conducted in a large-scale online learning environment with BYOD.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify HTML structures by analyzing visual models and implement them with 90% accuracy.
Learners can debug with over 80% efficiency by comparing error codes with visual models.
Learners can design complex web layouts with over 70% completion rates using step-by-step visual guides.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
